com.zendesk.sdk.network

Interface HelpCenterService


  • public interface HelpCenterService
    Defines the operations that can be carried out on Help Center.

    For more information on the APIs available see: Help Center REST API Documentation

    Currently this is defined using retrofit annotations but this could be changed in the future as long as these signatures remain.

    Locale should be in the format of: "en" or "en-us", this is a requirement of the REST API being called.

    • Method Detail

      • getCategories

        @GET(value="/api/v2/help_center/{locale}/categories.json?per_page=1000")
void getCategories(@Header(value="Authorization")
                     String authorization,
                     @Path(value="locale")
                     String locale,
                     retrofit.Callback<CategoriesResponse> callback)

void getSections(@Header(value="Authorization")
                   String authorization,
                   @Path(value="locale")
                   String locale,
                   @Path(value="id")
                   Long categoryId,
                   @Query(value="per_page")
                   int numberPerPage,
                   retrofit.Callback<SectionsResponse> callback)

      • getArticles

        @GET(value="/api/v2/help_center/{locale}/sections/{id}/articles.json")
void getArticles(@Header(value="Authorization")
                   String authorization,
                   @Path(value="locale")
                   String locale,
                   @Path(value="id")
                   Long sectionId,
                   @Query(value="include")
                   String sideLoadsToBeIncluded,
                   @Query(value="per_page")
                   int numberPerPage,
                   retrofit.Callback<ArticlesListResponse> callback)

      • listArticles

        @GET(value="/api/v2/help_center/{locale}/articles.json")
void listArticles(@Header(value="Authorization")
                    String authorization,
                    @Query(value="label_names")
                    String labelNames,
                    @Path(value="locale")
                    String locale,
                    @Query(value="include")
                    String include,
                    @Query(value="sort_by")
                    String sortBy,
                    @Query(value="sort_order")
                    String sortOrder,
                    @Query(value="page")
                    Integer page,
                    @Query(value="per_page")
                    Integer resultsPerPage,
                    retrofit.Callback<ArticlesListResponse> callback)
        Lists articles for the supplied query parameters
        Parameters:
        authorization - A bearer authorization header for access control, may be null for Help Centers that are not password protected
        labelNames - A comma-separated list of labels to restrict the search to. An article must have ALL of the labels specified in order to be matched
        locale - The locale to limit search results to.
        include - The comma-separated elements to sideload in the search
        sortBy - What the results will be sorted by.
        sortOrder - The order to display the results in
        page - The page to request
        resultsPerPage - The amount of results to display per page.
        callback - The callback called upon a success or error response.
        See Also:
        Sideloading

      • searchArticles

        @GET(value="/api/v2/help_center/articles/search.json")
void searchArticles(@Header(value="Authorization")
                      String authorization,
                      @Query(value="query")
                      String query,
                      @Query(value="locale")
                      String locale,
                      @Query(value="include")
                      String include,
                      @Query(value="label_names")
                      String labelNames,
                      @Query(value="category")
                      Long category,
                      @Query(value="section")
                      Long section,
                      @Query(value="page")
                      Integer page,
                      @Query(value="per_page")
                      Integer resultsPerPage,
                      retrofit.Callback<ArticlesSearchResponse> callback)
        Searches for articles.
        Parameters:
        authorization - A bearer authorization header for access control, may be null for Help Centers that are not password protected
        query - The search query
        locale - The locale to limit search results to.
        include - The comma-separated elements to sideload in the search
        labelNames - A comma-separated list of labels to restrict the search to. An article must have ALL of the labels specified in order to be matched
        category - The id of the category used to scope the search
        section - The id of the section used to scope the search
        page - The page to request
        resultsPerPage - The amount of results to display per page.
        callback - The callback called upon a success or error response.
        See Also:
        Sideloading

      • getArticle

        @GET(value="/api/v2/help_center/{locale}/articles/{article_id}.json")
void getArticle(@Header(value="Authorization")
                  String authorization,
                  @Path(value="locale")
                  String locale,
                  @Path(value="article_id")
                  Long articleId,
                  @Query(value="include")
                  String sideLoadsToBeIncluded,
                  retrofit.Callback<ArticleResponse> callback)

      • getAttachments

        @GET(value="/api/v2/help_center/articles/{article_id}/attachments/{attachment_type}.json")
void getAttachments(@Header(value="Authorization")
                      String authorization,
                      @Path(value="article_id")
                      Long articleId,
                      @Path(value="attachment_type")
                      String attachmentType,
                      retrofit.Callback<AttachmentResponse> callback)
